name: Sandclock Contributors
description: Sandclock welcomes everyone. But to amplify the voices of those who are truly committed to the project and its future we set up this journey. Do you have what it takes? *This is an example project. The scores below are not accurate. Feel free to jump in on Github to make this quest a reality.

tasks.name: Create a Web3 wallet
tasks.description: Visit https://ethereum.org/wallets and install a wallet to start your journey.

tasks.name: QUARTZ holder
tasks.description: Have any amount of QUARTZ tokens in your wallet.

tasks.name: Quartz hands
tasks.description: Score points for the number of months that you held QUARTZ for.

tasks.name: Understand the UX
tasks.description: Create your first foundation at https://app.sandclock.org

tasks.name: Heart of gold
tasks.description: Make a donation to a cause that's dear to your heart, no matter how small, it's the thought that counts.

tasks.name: Scrooge McDuck
tasks.description: Dollar cost average into an asset that you like.

tasks.name: Diplomat
tasks.description: Gain points every time you vote for a proposal.
